column1: Leninogorsk (Russian: Лениного́рск; Tatar: Лениногорск) is a town in the Republic of Tatarstan
column3: located 322 kilometers (200 mi) southeast of Kazan. Population: 64

column1: Within the framework of administrative divisions
column2: Leninogorsk serves as the administrative center of Leninogorsky District
column3: even though it is not a part of it. As an administrative division
column4: it is incorporated separately as the town of republic significance of Leninogorsk—an administrative unit with the status equal to that of the districts. As a municipal division
column5: the town of republic significance of Leninogorsk is incorporated within Leninogorsky Municipal District as Leninogorsk Urban Settlement.
